# Build artifacts
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.sln.docstates

# Logs and databases
*.log
*.ldf
*.mdf

# Visual Studio specific
.vs/
.vscode/
.vscode-test/
launchSettings.json

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.cache
*.csproj.user

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store

# Rider IDE
.idea/

# Dependency folders
node_modules/
wwwroot/lib/

# Visual Studio
.vs/
